people_also_ask.heading: Ares
people_also_ask.heading2: Ares was the ancient Greek god of war or, more properly, the spirit of battle. He represented the distasteful aspects of brutal warfare and slaughter.

knowledge_panel.description: god of war is an action-adventure game franchise created by david jaffe at sony's santa monica studio. it began in 2005 on the playstation 2 video game console, and has become a flagship title for the playstation brand, consisting of eight games across multiple platforms with a ninth currently in development. wikipedia
